award_title: CAS: Copper Catalyzed sp3 C-H Functionalization
subject: Publishing tools from your group
body:
Hi Tim,

I'm reaching out as we head into winter breakâ€”hope you have a good holiday.

I work on tools for research labs developing new catalytic methods. One thing I've noticed: when your trainees publish computational workflows or protocols, those contributions can travel with their names as others reuse them across different labs.

Ouro provides a thin API layer over computational workflows, letting other researchers reuse methods directly instead of recreating them from papers.

It might be useful for your group as you develop new C-H functionalization protocols and train students through those collaborations you mentioned.

Happy to get your group a look if it's helpful.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
